statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_location WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_location WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_location WHERE timestamp < '2021-10-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_location ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude), MAX(longitude) FROM vehicle_location;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_location WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_location WHERE longitude < 0.0 OR latitude > 0.0;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_location WHERE longitude BETWEEN -10.0 AND 10.0 AND latitude BETWEEN -5.0 AND 5.0 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_lat, AVG(longitude) AS avg_long FROM vehicle_location;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_location WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -75;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year > 2015 ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles, make FROM vehicles GROUP BY make HAVING total_vehicles > 2 ORDER BY total_vehicles DESC
SELECT v.vehicle_id, vl.latitude, vl.longitude, vl.timestamp FROM vehicle_locations vl JOIN vehicles v ON vl.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id ORDER BY vl.timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, last_update FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_routes WHERE start_location = 'New York';
SELECT vehicle_id, status, timestamp FROM vehicle_status WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_long FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_update FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_update DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM vehicle_routes WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT vehicle_id, status, timestamp FROM vehicle_status WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = '1d9a34b3-23bc-4903-8195-a22298e68832';
SELECT driver_name FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id = 'c3d3810d-728f-4f0f-9759-70d87413dcf7';
SELECT route_name FROM Routes WHERE route_id = '4e96ca43-c2a8-43e4-ab74-0ef51858f037';
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM Trips WHERE trip_id = '7276bf98-2b37-4a34-9f65-9d51ae4fae91';
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_name = 'Car' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT route_name FROM Routes WHERE LENGTH(route_name) > 5 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_id FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id IN ('abc123', 'def456') ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time FROM Trips WHERE end_time < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM Vehicles WHERE location_latitude BETWEEN 40 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_lon FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_lon FROM vehicles WHERE location_lat >= 40 AND location_lon <= -75;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_lat, location_lon FROM vehicles WHERE location_lat > 40;
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_name, location_lat, location_lon FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT route_name, distance AS route_distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time FROM trips WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
